channel.title: No DROP ? :S
channel.description:
can someone please help me with my "Orical - x" server.? cause no monster,pk,and then i drop item disapper :S nothing drop any items.. please tell me how i fix it. NPC drop files it say the monster drops but is there any place there i can change like drop on/off or something? cause they dont drop :( / all drop is off
msn: motorjanse@hotmail.com

item.title: No DROP ? :S
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Cleaned the spam, try to stay on topic

Read full topic

item.title: No DROP ? :S
item.dc:creator: @pildurass pildurass
item.description:
@pildurass wrote:

i had the exact same problem with my rsps simple fix =] first of all i still cant see monster drops when i am the owner of the server… idk why idrc why anyhow lol. I also cant yell on my server as owner… doesnt matter. To answer your question about the drop thing. Go to this: Server files>source>server>model>players>packets>dropitem.java. then search for a blank source (doesnt matter which one) that can drop items. Delete the dropitem.java you have. Click and drag the new file compile, runserver problem fixed! hope that helps! =]

Read full topic

item.title: No DROP ? :S
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

It’s PI, and add what you want the npc to drop in data/cfg/NPCDrops.tsm.

This is the format:

#Npc Name Npc Id:rarity for drop item id:amount item id:amount and so on.

Hope I helped. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
